recs.title: Beverly Hills Cop
recs.synopsis: Streetwise Detroit detective Eddie Murphy pursues a colleague's killer to LA, causing mayhem for local cop Judge Reinhold. Action comedy. Contains strong language/violence. (1984)(100 mins)

recs.title: Chaos
recs.synopsis: Disgraced cop Jason Statham is recalled to duty when a bank heist baffles police. Can he outwit crook Wesley Snipes? Clever, twisty thriller. Strong language/violence. (2005)(102 mins)

recs.title: Night Falls on Manhattan
recs.synopsis: District Attorney Andy Garcia is torn when an investigation into police corruption hits close to home. Tense, twisting thriller from director Sidney Lumet. (1997)(109 mins)

recs.title: Frontera
recs.synopsis: When tragedy strikes, a man trying to sneak over the Mexican border is wrongly accused of murder. Western drama with Ed Harris, Michael Pena and Eva Longoria. (2014)(99 mins)

recs.title: Ordinary People
recs.synopsis: Oscar-winning drama about a family traumatised by the death of its eldest son and how his younger brother copes with the tragedy. Timothy Hutton and Donald Sutherland star. (1980)(119 mins)

recs.title: Midnight Cowboy
recs.synopsis: Naive hustler Jon Voight drifts to New York and takes up with Dustin Hoffman's streetwise con man in this Oscar-winning classic from director John Schlesinger. (1969)(108 mins)

recs.title: Escape from Alcatraz
recs.synopsis: Fact-based adventure following a group of convicts as they attempt to break out of the world's most notorious prison. Starring Clint Eastwood. Contains flashing images. (1979)(107 mins)

recs.title: Cool Hand Luke
recs.synopsis: Paul Newman is unforgettable as the defiant Deep South chain-gang prisoner whose rebellion makes him a hero with fellow inmates. An Oscar-winning George Kennedy co-stars. (1967)(122 mins)
